attributes.action: Abolish VAT on repairs, to reduce waste and protect the environment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Charging VAT on repairs leads to a ‘disposable’ culture, where minor faults lead to items being scrapped or discarded, and landfills overflowing with goods that could have been useful for several more years.
Could the Prime Minister abolish this awful form of taxation, making recycling and repair of items far more affordable, and reduce pressure on our limited natural resources.
